gems.name: ruby-shell
gems.info: A shell written in Ruby with extensive tab completions, aliases/nicks, history, syntax highlighting, theming, auto-cd, auto-opening files and more. UPDATE v3.5.0: Nick/history export, 9 new tool completions (kubectl, terraform, aws, brew, etc.), validation templates, startup tips, improved :info, aggressive suggest_command optimization for huge PATHs (18K+ executables), timestamp shows corrected commands!
